6thLevelClericSpells.Name: Blade Barrier
6thLevelClericSpells.Description: You create a vertical wall of whirling, razor-sharp blades made of magical energy.

6thLevelClericSpells.Name: Create Undead
6thLevelClericSpells.Description: You can cast this spell only at night. Choose up to three corpses of Medium or Small humanoids within range.

6thLevelClericSpells.Name: Find the Path
6thLevelClericSpells.Description: This spell allows you to find the shortest, most direct physical route to a specific fixed location that you are familiar with on the same plane of existence.

6thLevelClericSpells.Name: Forbiddance
6thLevelClericSpells.Description: You create a ward against magical travel that protects up to 40,000 square feet of floor space to a height of 30 feet above the floor.

6thLevelClericSpells.Name: Harm
6thLevelClericSpells.Description: You unleash a virulent disease on a creature that you can see within range.

6thLevelClericSpells.Name: Heal
6thLevelClericSpells.Description: A surge of positive energy washes through the creature, causing it to regain 70 hit points.

6thLevelClericSpells.Name: Heroes' Feast
6thLevelClericSpells.Description: You bring forth a great feast, including magnificent food and drink.

6thLevelClericSpells.Name: Planar Ally
6thLevelClericSpells.Description: You beseech an otherworldly entity for aid. The being must be known to you: a god, a primordial, a demon prince, or some other being of cosmic power.

6thLevelClericSpells.Name: True Seeing
6thLevelClericSpells.Description: This spell gives the willing creature you touch the ability to see things as they actually are.

6thLevelClericSpells.Name: Word of Recall
6thLevelClericSpells.Description: You and up to five willing creatures within 5 feet of you instantly teleport to a previously designated sanctuary.
